mapper.insert: MERGE INTO CAR_DETAIL c USING( SELECT #{car_code} AS car_code, #{car_num} AS car_num, #{car_status} AS car_status, #{car_type} AS car_type, #{pro_category} AS pro_category FROM DUAL) new_data ON (c.CAR_CODE = new_data.CAR_CODE AND c.PRO_CATEGORY = new_data.PRO_CATEGORY) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET c.CAR_NUM = new_data.car_num, c.CAR_STATUS = new_data.car_status, c.CAR_TYPE = new_data.car_type WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CAR_CODE, CAR_NUM, CAR_STATUS, CAR_TYPE, PRO_CATEGORY, CAR_INT_DATE) VALUES (CAR_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{car_num},#{car_status},#{car_type},#{pro_category},SYSDATE)

MERGE INTO PROPERTY c USING( SELECT #{property_code} AS property_code, #{property_name} AS property_name, #{pro_category} AS pro_category FROM DUAL) new_data ON (c.PROPERTY_CODE = new_data.PROPERTY_CODE AND c.PRO_CATEGORY = new_data.PRO_CATEGORY) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET c.property_name = new_data.property_name WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (property_code, property_name, PRO_CATEGORY, PRO_INT_DATE) VALUES (PRO_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{property_name},#{pro_category},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT MANAGE_CODE, NAME, DEP_NAME, CAR_NUM, TO_CHAR(BOOKING_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') AS "BOOKING_START", TO_CHAR(BOOKING_DONE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') AS "BOOKING_DONE" FROM CAR_MANAGE JOIN (SELECT NAME, EMPLOYEE_NUM, DEP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEP_CODE)) USING (EMPLOYEE_NUM) JOIN (SELECT CAR_NUM, CAR_CODE FROM CAR_DETAIL) USING (CAR_CODE) WHERE BOOKING_AGREE = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE CAR_MANAGE SET BOOKING_AGREE = 1 WHERE MANAGE_CODE = #{manage_code}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PROPERTY WHERE PROPERTY_CODE = #{property_code} AND PRO_CATEGORY = #{pro_category}
mapper.select: SELECT PROPERTY_CODE, PROPERTY_NAME, TO_CHAR(PRO_INT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "PRO_INT_DATE", PRO_CATEGORY FROM PROPERTY WHERE PRO_CATEGORY = #{pro_category}

SELECT CAR_NUM, TO_CHAR(CAR_INT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CAR_INT_DATE", CAR_CODE, CASE WHEN CAR_STATUS = 0 THEN '운용가능' WHEN CAR_STATUS = 1 THEN '수리/점검중' END AS "CAR_STATUS", TYPE_NAME, CAR_TYPE FROM CAR_DETAIL JOIN CAR_TYPE USING (CAR_TYPE) WHERE PRO_CATEGORY = #{pro_category}

SELECT * FROM CAR_DETAIL cd WHERE not car_code IN ( SELECT CAR_CODE FROM CAR_MANAGE cm WHERE ( BOOKING_START >= TO_DATE(#{booking_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND BOOKING_START <= TO_DATE(#{booking_done}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (BOOKING_DONE >= TO_DATE(#{booking_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND BOOKING_DONE <= TO_DATE(#{booking_done}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) ) AND CAR_TYPE =5
mapper.update: UPDATE CAR_DETAIL SET CAR_STATUS = #{car_status} WHERE CAR_CODE = #{car_code}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM CAR_MANAGE WHERE CAR_CODE =#{car_code} AND BOOKING_AGREE = 0 ORDER BY CAR_CODE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT cd.CAR_NUM ,cm.BOOKING_AGREE,cm.car_code FROM CAR_DETAIL cd LEFT OUTER JOIN CAR_MANAGE cm ON cd.CAR_CODE = cm.CAR_CODE WHERE cm.MANAGE_CODE = #{manage_code}
